title: Apex Legends Mobile now available for pre-registration on Google Play
content:
Electronic Arts revealed last year that Apex Legends, the popular competitive first-person shooter game for PC and consoles, was going to receive a mobile port. There hasn’t been much news about Apex Legends Mobile since then, but now a listing for the game is live on the Google Play Store. The Google Play Store includes

The post Apex Legends Mobile now available for pre-registration on Google Play appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Electronic Arts has published a pre-registration page for Apex Legends Mobile on Android, as well as the requirements for Android and iOS.
